title: Simulation Game-Based Infrastructure Management Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Infrastructure Management Training with Practical Emphasis Using Simulation Games in Digital Device-Provided Environments

learning_goals: Learners will be able to analyze and explain the interdependencies of urban infrastructure systems through SimCity-based simulations.
Learners will be able to execute resource allocation and infrastructure planning processes in a virtual city environment via simulation games.
Learners will be able to evaluate sustainable infrastructure management strategies and propose improvements through competitive group activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
